channel.title: Asteria 3.0
channel.description: Hello everyone I'm having some trouble setting up Asteria in eclipse. I got groovy to work, but now I'm having an issue with the plugins, I'm not sure if they're in the correct folder because eclipse isn't finding them.. "FightCavesHandler cannot be resolved", Etc. Please help, I've tried everything. Thanks in advance

item.title: Asteria 3.0
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Make sure the project is a “Groovy project”

If you’re still having trouble follow this tutorial http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/594956-asteria-3-0-how-run-asteria-tutorial.html

Read full topic

item.title: Asteria 3.0
item.dc:creator: @Ext_Julian Ext Julian
item.description:
@Ext_Julian wrote:

Hello everyone I’m having some trouble setting up Asteria in eclipse. I got groovy to work, but now I’m having an issue with the plugins, I’m not sure if they’re in the correct folder because eclipse isn’t finding them… “FightCavesHandler cannot be resolved”, Etc. Please help, I’ve tried everything. Thanks in advance

Read full topic
